Ancient: Looks around for the Other attacker of the Maximal Base.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Nighlight:

Nighlight looked with fear Roockseeker's attempt she looked to 
Danzabar and said "We should go inside!!! this is dangerous!!! COme 
Denzabar I don't like left alone my daughter int hsi situation!!!"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> OOC: I've been kinda busy, and yesterday I flunked my internship, 
so 
> from now till january, I should be more available. Of course, this 
> excludes December 17. So here comes the rest of the meteor charge. 
> Remember that the minions are NPCs and are thus EXTREMELY 
powerful. 
> However, they can be killed... theoretically... mwa hahahaha!
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Rockseeker was well protected by his rock hard shell. He was 
almost 
> oblivious to the shots that converged on him. However, His armor 
was 
> slowly blasting away, but he knew he could damage the base.
> 
> Inside, though, Yggdrasil Prime (remember him?) suddenly came out 
of 
> CR and, through his various electronics, understood the situation. 
> He rushed to the defense system and diverted all power to the 
> shields.
> 
> Rockseeker was only meters away when he was stopped by a massive 
> energy surge as the shields came online. It caused him to yell in 
> pain and to transform. He was thrown back in the battlefield.
> 
> AzureBlade swooped down on that easy target. He breathed a jet of 
> freezing air that covered and partly paralyzed the Minion. Still 
> airbound, he swung his tail and sent him rolling.
> 
> AzureBlade: Kup! He's yours! I'm going agaisnt that one!
> 
> He took altitude and prepared for a gigantic duel...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: in the past couple Moves He and Rockseeker were getting 
into 
> it. He was on an intercepting course. They are battling infront of 
> the Maximal base ams the Weapon he is using is a sword that has a 
> Par, attack which renders the target parylized for a short period 
of 
> time. See Ancient threw two daggers at Rockseeker and now is 
moving 
> to intercept rockseeker. Rockseeker was on a course as a meteor to 
> the maximal base.
> > 
> > EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:In a message dated 12/10/03 8:10:43 PM 
> Central Standard Time, jeramej@y... writes:
> > 
> > 
> > Ancient: Closes in on his target and Strikes with a parylizing 
> Blow.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > OOC: Am I missing something there?  I would consider that a huge 
> no-no in all my years of Role Playing. 
> > 
> > :: Shakes head:: of course... don't know what target he was 
> closing in on & all. A blow to who, etc. 
> > 
> > 
> > Stac
